name: CONCEPT & RESEARCH
membership: SEAP = Society of European Affairs Professionals. CORE Managing Partner, Lucyna Gutman-Grauer is one of the founding members of SEAP and has been sitting on its Board for several years.
goal:
CORE supports businesses and organisations alike in their communication, training, events organisation and advocacy campaigns with the goal to improve efficiency in their dealings with the European Union and general public.
CORE Managing Partner lectures regularly on the EU Institutions and the EU Lobbying processes.
interests: Communication, Culture, Education, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs
euInitiatives: Institutional affairs with main focus on Transparency
